content: baah blue iris by michelle miller 2013 k2tog = knit 2 together ssk = slip slip knit st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side pattern notes this shawl is constructed of a main body with a knit-­ on lace edging the body is constructed in a traditional triangle method beginning with chart a then moving to chart b after there are 25 sts the knit-­ on edging begins with chart c working to the marked center stitch of the body short row are used to shape the edging around the center point of the body written instructions are provided for all charts so you may work from the description charts or the written instructions for more this quick-­ to-­ knit triangle lace shawlette is simple information on knitted lace triangle construction and elegant with its lovely knit-­ on lace edging see http //www fickleknitter com/archives/2009/12/knitted needles -­ lace-­ triangle-­ construction-­ by-­ michelle-­ miller htm size us 6/4 0 mm knitting needles or size needed to get stockinette row 9 k1 yo k7 yo k1 twice 21 sts stitch row 11 k1 yo k9 yo k1 twice 25 sts place stitch marker to the right of the center stitch finished pattern measurements 50 inches wide by slip the
